scenario.name: Register one user without authentication
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [$luserIpPort];branch=[branch] From: [$ruserAdd];tag=[pid]SIPpTag00[call_number] To: [$ruserAdd] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: [$luserAddContact] Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: Linphone/Linphone-3.3.x (sipp/unknown) Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
